full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN SKYONG DGRA LHA CHEN PO GNOD SBYIN KshE TRA P'A LAR GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(SBYIN KshE TRA P'A LAR GTOR MA DBUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS 'DI NI, RANG CAG RNAMS KYI 'DREN PA GCIG BU BLA MA DAM PA PAndI TA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE'I BZHED PA BZHIN DU, SNYOMS LAS PA BTZUN GZUGS KIRTI BADZRA GYIS DAM PA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN 'BOL RTZOM DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG THABS MKHAS SO, ,)
